interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Maestee 9 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Kit, 6 Colors (8ml) with Base and Top Coat and Matte Top Gel (8ml) Nail Polish Hot Modern Muse Collection Soak Off Nail Gel Polish Starter Professional Kit Best Mothers Day Gift Review Date: 2021/07/06 Store: maestee Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'maestee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 3.66 x 1.42 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} Review Text: Nice looking set colors are beautiful. All though I love the colors, the formula needs some re-working.
When applying the base coat it began separating on my nail like it had oil in it. My nails didn't last longer than two days before it started to lift and peel. Review Title: Nice colors formula needs some work Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Qiray {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} Very pretty, they have a good stretch depending you your hairstyle you may twist twice. You get two of each color. The only thing I did not like is that these hair ties have a paint smell to them so wash them before wearing them. Good STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded） styleagal {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'} [[VIDEOID:c1d81e3cfad618ed65e971a49ab65264]] This is a nice drill great for beginners. Just take some practice to get good at using it on your self and others hand. The power cord is not long enough and the drill bits is hard to push them in and to pull out. If you have never used a drill start working with the lower speed first. Works very well Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine) PRETTY FRANK {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} I like the fact that its organic and made in the US. However, this is not a deodorant for someone who is on the move. I do have sweaty underarms and I had to clean my armpits and apply this several times a day to be dry. I don't like that I have to put this on with my fingers. I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place. The jasmine scent is wonderful. It is a small jar but you get a lot. Not for me YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches) YsesoAi {'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'YsesoAi', 'Color': 'Pink, Blue, Ivory, Yellow, Green', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '745895771436'} My hair is naturally curly so , I wanted to see how it would do on a blowout. I like the curly pattern that it creates the only problem I had was my hair was to long for this, pulling your hair threw with the hook that's given was easy. It did not hurt to pull your hair threw the spiral curlers. Short Hair Only AMAJULIE Non Slip Flexible Silicon Wigs Fix Strong Hold Comfort Silicone Lace Wig Grip Transparent Headband Hair Band Adjustable for Lace Wigs (Light Brown) AMAJULIE {'Material': 'Silicone', 'Fabric Type': 'Silicone,Silicon,Lace', 'Brand': 'AMAJULIE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 2.28 x 0.55 inches; 0.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '192389741275'} I love this thing, it's very comfortable and has nice snug fit. It's not to tight and the ridges are on the top and bottom so it stays on your head and grips the lace on the wig. You don't see the grip under your lace, this thing really keeps your wig on. You must be wearing a Lace Front wig for it to work. My new friend Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series) MIZHSE {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} This kit only comes with the poly gel, nail forms and a free gift. You will need your own tools to apply. I love this formula, very easy work with it doesn’t dry fast so you have to build or layer. What I like the most that after putting under the lamp your nails don’t have that tacky layer. So the poly gel is sheer but building as in adding more will make it thicker. I also like the nail forms. The best I’ve used so far 7pcs Pearl Hair Clips Large Hair Clips Pins Barrette Ties Hair Headwear Barrette for Party Wedding Daily, Gift for Girls and Women MEETWIN {'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 3.5 x 0.2 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '723668014119'} These are very pretty to jazz up your hairstyle. I love the big clips very easy to open and close also holds a of hair. None of the pearls were scratch or peeling. Definitely worth getting. Beautiful Pearl accessories Curly Girl Hair Spray Bottle – Ultra Fine Extended Water Mister for Curly Hairstyling, Care and Moisturizing (10 Fl. Oz. & 24 Fl. Oz Set, Swirls White Top) Curly Girl {'Brand': 'Curly Girl', 'Color': 'Swirls White Top', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '11.06 x 6.14 x 3.39 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'UPC': '853356005850', 'Manufacturer': 'Curly Girl'} [[VIDEOID:7fc8bfe19a29a244cf5bea86c34ad870]] I absolutely love this bottle. With the mist spray water isn’t dripping everywhere. I don’t have to keep refilling it up every day like I do with the regular spray bottle. Every easy to use just fill up with water put on the nozzle and spray where you like. Every curly hair girl or guy needs this! Short Bob Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs Natural Color Lace Wigs 100% Virgin Huam Hair Lace Front Side Part Wigs for Women MarchQueen {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'MarchQueen', 'Package Dimensions': '12.64 x 8.86 x 2.05 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841725'} Such a cute wig the hair wasn't soft as I thought it was be but its very nice. Earrings and wig cap came with the bob wig, no smell, lightweight, and little to no shedding. Very easy to install nice short cut cute for a quick look on the go and or summer style. So Cute ! JIADEL Gel Nail Polish Colors Set,Confetti Glitter Gel Nail Polish With No Wipe Base and Top Coat,Soak Off UV LED Nail Art Salon Starter Manicure Kit JIADEL {'Brand': 'JIADEL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '16', 'Liquid Volume': '0.17 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '11 x 9 x 1 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '11 x 9 x 1 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '642940399488'} Packaging is nice love how the bottles shows what color of the polish your picking. Nice color glitter polish however they are not long lasting. I did my nails in both matte and gloss look and within two days my nails with the gloss top coat peeled off. My base and top coat bottles were relabeled so I don't know if that had something to do with it or not. The nail polish is thick because the glitter so you will need to give it a good shake or tap it a bit in your palm. Nice colors very small bottles 6 Packs Butterfly Locs Crochet Hair 12 Inch Short Bob Distressed Locs Crochet Braids Pre Looped Faux Locs Crochet Hair for Women Pre twisted Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (#1B/27) M-BOX {'Brand': 'M-BOX', 'Extension Length': '12 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 10.24 x 3.35 inches; 1.21 Pounds', 'UPC': '717373471985'} I love that the hair is wrapped nice and tight come with enough packs to do a full head. This hair soft, lightweight, and very light smell. These locs were very hard to install because the loops were not done good, the loops are supper small and short. When trying to make to loop bigger to pass the loc through, the loop came undone. And by the loops being this way it took me a full day to install because I struggled pulling the locs through the tiny loops. Also was making the locs unravel. Wrapped tight but small loops Maestee 9 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Kit, 6 Colors (8ml) with Base and Top Coat and Matte Top Gel (8ml) Nail Polish Hot Modern Muse Collection Soak Off Nail Gel Polish Starter Professional Kit Best Mothers Day Gift maestee {'Brand': 'maestee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 3.66 x 1.42 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} Nice looking set colors are beautiful. All though I love the colors, the formula needs some re-working.
When applying the base coat it began separating on my nail like it had oil in it. My nails didn't last longer than two days before it started to lift and peel. Nice colors formula needs some work
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user continues to prioritize versatile beauty tools and has expanded their exploration to include nail care solutions, particularly gel nail polish options. They are drawn to products that offer quick and stylish results while enhancing their overall beauty experience.

- **Aesthetic Preferences**: Vibrant colors and unique designs remain paramount in the user's choices, as evidenced by their appreciation for visually appealing products. They seek beauty items that combine functionality with creativity, supporting their desire for self-expression.

- **Functionality**: Ease of use in beauty routines is increasingly important to the user, as highlighted by their recent experience with nail products. They seek tools that not only simplify application but also ensure reliable performance, especially in terms of longevity and durability.

- **Quality Assessment**: The user maintains a discerning eye for quality and is willing to provide constructive feedback on product performance. They value durability and effectiveness, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of both advantages and limitations within their reviews.

- **Sensory Awareness**: The user emphasizes tools that align with an active lifestyle while allowing for creative exploration, showcasing their awareness of how beauty products integrate into daily life.

- **Buying Habit**: Their purchasing decisions reflect a blend of elegance and practicality, emphasizing aesthetic appeal alongside functionality. While they continue to seek unique and vibrant accessories, recent reviews indicate ongoing concerns with product formulations that impact usability and performance.
